title: Portfolio Site
description: Blazor WASM portfolio powered by MudBlazor, GitHub Pages, and CI/CD pipeline.

title: Interactive Comments (React + .NET + AWS)
description: A full-stack interactive comment system using React 19, TypeScript, and Vite for the frontend, with a .NET 8 Web API hosted on AWS Lambda and integrated via API Gateway. Features nested replies, voting, real-time updates, rate limiting, and public GitHub Pages deployment. Currently using in-memory storage seeded from JSON, with future plans for DynamoDB integration, email notifications (SNS/SES), and CI/CD for Lambda.
